v8:item.v8:content: Поиск слов в наименовании и описании отчета а также в наименованиях настроек отчета.
Search in report name, description, and settings.
Wyszukaj słowa w nazwie i opisie raportu, a także w nazwach ustawień raportu.
Suchen Sie nach Wörtern im Namen und in der Beschreibung des Berichts sowie in den Namen der Berichtseinstellungen.
Căutați cuvinte în numele și descrierea raportului și, de asemenea, în numele setărilor raportului.
Raporun isminde ve açıklamasında ve ayrıca rapor ayar adlarında kelimeleri arayın.
Búsqueda de palabras en el nombre y la descripción del informe, y también en los nombres de la configuración del informe.
Отбор по типу отчетов: Внутренние / Дополнительные / Внешние.
Filter by report type: Internal, Additional, or External.
Filtruj według typu raportu: Wewnętrzny / Dodatkowy / Zewnętrzny.
Nach Berichtstyp filtern: Intern/ Zusätzlich/ Extern.
Filtrare după tipul rapoartelor: Interne / Suplimentare / Externe.
Rapor türüne göre filtrele: Dahili / Ek / Harici.
Filtrar por el tipo de informe: Interno/ Adicional / Externo.
Grupo de las configuraciones del usuario
Видимость по умолчанию в панели отчетов
Vizibilitatea implicită în panoul de rapoarte
Visibilidad por defecto en el panel de informes

Settings.QueryText: SELECT ALLOWED ReportsOptions.Ref, ReportsOptions.DataVersion, ReportsOptions.DeletionMark, ISNULL(ConfigurationOptions.MeasurementsKey, ExtensionOptions.MeasurementsKey) AS MeasurementsKey, ReportsOptions.Custom, NOT ReportsOptions.Custom AS Predefined, CASE WHEN ReportsOptions.Custom OR ReportsOptions.PredefinedVariant IN ( UNDEFINED, VALUE(Catalog.PredefinedReportsOptions.EmptyRef), VALUE(Catalog.PredefinedExtensionsReportsOptions.EmptyRef)) THEN CAST(ISNULL(OptionPresentations.Description, ReportsOptions.Description) AS STRING(1000)) WHEN &IsMainLanguage THEN CAST(ISNULL(ISNULL(ConfigurationOptions.Description, ExtensionOptions.Description), ReportsOptions.Description) AS STRING(1000)) ELSE CAST(ISNULL(ISNULL(PresentationsFromConfiguration.Description, PresentationsFromExtensions.Description), ReportsOptions.Description) AS STRING(1000)) END AS Description, NOT ReportsOptions.AvailableToAuthorOnly AS AvailableToAllUsers, ReportsOptions.Report, ReportsOptions.VariantKey, ReportsOptions.ReportType, ReportsOptions.Author, CASE WHEN &IsMainLanguage AND SUBSTRING(ReportsOptions.Details, 1, 1) = "" THEN CAST(ISNULL(ConfigurationOptions.Details, ExtensionOptions.Details) AS STRING(1000)) WHEN NOT &IsMainLanguage AND SUBSTRING(ReportsOptions.Details, 1, 1) = "" THEN CAST(ISNULL(PresentationsFromConfiguration.Details, PresentationsFromExtensions.Details) AS STRING(1000)) ELSE CAST(ISNULL(OptionPresentations.Details, ReportsOptions.Details) AS STRING(1000)) END AS Details, CASE WHEN ReportsOptions.ReportType IN (VALUE(Enum.ReportTypes.Internal), ReportsOptions.ReportType = VALUE(Enum.ReportTypes.Extension)) THEN ReportsOptions.Report.Name WHEN ReportsOptions.ReportType = VALUE(Enum.ReportTypes.Additional) THEN ReportsOptions.Report ELSE SUBSTRING(CAST(ReportsOptions.Report AS STRING(150)), 14, 137) END AS ReportName, CASE WHEN ReportsOptions.DeletionMark = TRUE THEN 4 WHEN ReportsOptions.Custom = FALSE THEN 5 ELSE 3 END AS PictureIndex FROM Catalog.ReportsOptions AS ReportsOptions LEFT JOIN Catalog.PredefinedReportsOptions AS ConfigurationOptions ON ReportsOptions.PredefinedVariant = ConfigurationOptions.Ref LEFT JOIN Catalog.PredefinedExtensionsReportsOptions AS ExtensionOptions ON ReportsOptions.PredefinedVariant = ExtensionOptions.Ref LEFT JOIN Catalog.ReportsOptions.Presentations AS OptionPresentations ON ReportsOptions.Ref = OptionPresentations.Ref AND (OptionPresentations.LanguageCode = &LanguageCode) LEFT JOIN Catalog.PredefinedReportsOptions.Presentations AS PresentationsFromConfiguration ON ReportsOptions.PredefinedVariant = PresentationsFromConfiguration.Ref AND (PresentationsFromConfiguration.LanguageCode = &LanguageCode) LEFT JOIN Catalog.PredefinedExtensionsReportsOptions.Presentations AS PresentationsFromExtensions ON ReportsOptions.PredefinedVariant = PresentationsFromExtensions.Ref AND (PresentationsFromExtensions.LanguageCode = &LanguageCode) WHERE ReportsOptions.Report IN(&AvailableReports) AND CASE WHEN NOT &HasVariantFilter THEN NOT ReportsOptions.PredefinedVariant IN (&DIsabledApplicationOptions) ELSE ReportsOptions.Ref IN (&UserOptions) END
